GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
ACT
No. 1 of 2016
DateofAssent:5thJanuary,2016
An Act to provide for the printing and publication of the
Constitution; to provide for the savings and transitional
provisions of existing State organs, State institutions,
administrations, offices, institutions and laws; to provide
for the savings of succession to assets, rights, liabilities,
obligations and legal proceedings; and to provide for
matters connected with, or incidental to, the foregoing.
